content.text:
# Timeline of the world's richest person

This is a timeline of the wealthiest person in the world. As of September 2025, the world's richest person is Elon Musk. Other people who have had the title since the year 2000 include Larry Ellison, Bernard Arnault, Jeff Bezos, Bill Gates, Amancio Ortega, Carlos Slim and Warren Buffett
